name: phantom-ds-monorepo
description: Design system monorepo with Tailwind, Atlassian tokens, Storybook, docs, and site

scripts.start:docs: npm run build:docs && npm --prefix docs run start
scripts.start:site: npm run build:site && npm --prefix site run start
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix design-system install && npm --prefix storybook install && npm --prefix docs install && npm --prefix site install
scripts.clean: rm -rf design-system/node_modules design-system/dist storybook/node_modules storybook/storybook-static docs/node_modules docs/.next site/node_modules site/.next
